text: Lockheed Martin Transit Center is a light rail and transit bus station ran by Santa Clara Valley Transportation Authority (VTA), located in Sunnyvale, California. This station is served by the Orange Line of the VTA Light Rail system. The land for the transit center was donated by Lockheed Martin during the planning of VTA's Tasman West light rail extension. Category:Rapid transit systems in the United States Category:Santa Clara County, California
title: Lockheed Martin Transit Center
